statements: DELETE FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE order_id = 100 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM OrderProcessingAlerts WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND alert_level >= 3;
DELETE FROM StockAlerts WHERE s_id = 100 AND stock_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_status = 'Cancelled' AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM OrderProcessing WHERE order_id = 1001 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM LowStockAlerts WHERE threshold < current_stock;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND price > 50;
